body: Can you also expose inplace versions of these function? (Just modify `_addcop` to accept a third `inplace` arg)? It seems that we forgot about them. Please also add them to method tests.
body_html: Can you also expose inplace versions of these function? (Just modify _addcop to accept a third inplace arg)? It seems that we forgot about them. Please also add them to method tests.
body_text: Can you also expose inplace versions of these function? (Just modify _addcop to accept a third inplace arg)? It seems that we forgot about them. Please also add them to method tests.
